help-file.title: DARKNESS
help-file.content:
Syntax: inn darkness (for Drow Elf and Shades) Area of Effect: <room> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
This spell blankets the room in a cloak of magical darkness, through which no light will penetrate. It will also dispel "Continual Light" spells in a room. If this spell is cast upon a magically illuminating item, "Darkness" will smother the light emanating from it.
